Translations.Text: waqala fir'ʿawnu i'tuni bikulli sahirin ʿalimin
falamma jaa l-saharatu qala lahum musa alqu ma antum mul'quna
falamma alqaw qala musa ma ji'tum bihi l-sih'ru inna l-laha sayub'tiluhu inna l-laha la yus'lihu ʿamala l-muf'sidina
wayuhiqqu l-lahu l-haqa bikalimatihi walaw kariha l-muj'rimuna
fama amana limusa illa dhurriyyatun min qawmihi ʿala khawfin min fir'ʿawna wamala-ihim an yaftinahum wa-inna fir'ʿawna laʿalin fi l-ardi wa-innahu lamina l-mus'rifina
waqala musa yaqawmi in kuntum amantum bil-lahi faʿalayhi tawakkalu in kuntum mus'limina
faqalu ʿala l-lahi tawakkalna rabbana la tajʿalna fit'natan lil'qawmi l-zalimina
wa-awhayna ila musa wa-akhihi an tabawwaa liqawmikuma bimis'ra buyutan wa-ij'ʿalu buyutakum qib'latan wa-aqimu l-salata wabashiri l-mu'minina

waqala musa rabbana innaka atayta fir'ʿawna wamala-ahu zinatan wa-amwalan fi l-hayati l-dun'ya rabbana liyudillu ʿan sabilika rabbana it'mis ʿala amwalihim wa-ush'dud ʿala qulubihim fala yu'minu hatta yarawu l-ʿadhaba l-alima
